Okey kan du tala om för mig hur jag skall få fram texten då ??

I use vlc ( http://www.videolan.org/vlc/ ) to play mine movie

To enable them, go to the Video menu, and to Subtitles track. All available subtitles tracks will be listed. Select one to get the subtitles. Depending on the media, a description (language, for example) might be available for the track.


http://www.videolan.org/doc/play-howto/en/ch03.html

Best Regards :)
Zen_Bud

Tack skall du ha Zen_Bud hur bränner man denna så texten hänger med ??

This is actually 1080p not 720p, or did you rip it from a 720p source and upscaled to 1080p? Bitrate should be ok for 720p but is too low for 1080p (all the snaps look very soft).
Since the picture ratios vary but usually the width is maxed out here's a simple rule of thumb to check if it's 1080p or 720p:
width: 1920 = 1080p
width: 1280 = 720p
